VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.label: cryptipath
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.description: A path that only cryptobiomorphs, the naive or the insane persue. For it comes with risks of permenant alterations to the user's mind.
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.tooltip: Cryptipaths reach out to the unique nature of cryptobiological life forms for abilities many deem unatural.
